page.title: 08CRICKET AND TENNIS BRIDGE
page.content: There is a Recreation Ground in Bridge There is a slide,some swings,a see-saw and a metal horse with coloured seats. Dad,my brother James and I go down to the Recreation Ground to play cricket. On Saturdays and Sundays the Bridge Cricket Club play cricket on the Cricket Pitch.I have watched them playing quite a few times. They have a white pavillion where they change.Next to the pavillion there is a great big roller.On Sundays in winter they play football on the football pitch. On 6 Tuesdays in June and July some children have tennis coaching on the Tennis Courts on the Recreation Ground It is 6pm to 7pm for the Junior Session and 7pm to 8pm for the Senior Session. We go to Junior Session.It is organized by Mrs.Hill.She sometimes has helpers.After 5 weeks practise we have a tournament.It is very exciting.
